review: Works really great. All movies come in really clear.  I am just frustrated with Amazon Prime's pay up front for 1 year policy. Unlike Netflix, they require full pymt of $99 instead of pay by the month. Therefore, after watching Netflix using Fire TV stick, I am searching for other streaming companies that charge monthly.Thankyou
author: Retiree

review: I like all the options it gives me and it works great
author: chuck

review: Smaller version of the fire box, I love it.
author: Smilinez

review: Not sure why I gave it the second star.It's been very disappointing.I understand that there are some 40,00 free movies available with a Prime membership , but where are they?I've had the device for 2 weeks now and I've looked up multiple movies -- some fairly recent releases , some older and some really old.So far , I've found only one.That's pitiful.
author: RW

review: I had planned on purchasing a used laptop for $100 to view prime and Netflix but saw this and the price was right.  Works great.
author: Amazon Customer
